content: **knitted jacket in drops big merino the piece is worked bottom up with split in the sides sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the prairie rose singlet / top crop pattern here 1 see the paririe rose shorts pattern here 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern mb-064 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 600-650-700-800-850-950 g colour 01 off white drops buttons no 512 5-5-5-6-6-6 items needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/230-3-a-prairie-rose-set-singlet 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/230-3-b-prairie-rose-shorts
